title: I love movies and I love music, so why are musicals so off putting? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s unlikely that you love all movies and all music, so it becomes a question about your personal tastes, which we would only be guessing at. I’m not disagreeing that some musicals are off-putting, but if you could be specific about your objections, I could direct you to some that are not. Movie musicals often have the added burden of needing to cast bankable stars and the results can sink an otherwise worthwhile project. At the very least, go see Come From Away at your earliest convenience. I’ve yet to meet someone who didn’t appreciate it.
